short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Telesur navigator plugin to lastest news

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The teleSUR extension is a gateway to the information platform, offering a personalized and enriched experience for the user. Receive the latest teleSUR news directly in your browser.

Advantages:
• Convenience: Access all teleSUR information from your browser.

• Speed: Stay updated in real time.

Featured Features:

• Breaking news: Don't miss a single detail of current events. Receive the latest teleSUR news directly in your browser.

• Live streaming: Enjoy our programming anytime, anywhere.
• Push notifications: Be the first to know the most important news. Receive personalized alerts on your device.

• Access to social networks: Connect with our community and share your opinions.

Why is it important?
With our extension, you will always have teleSUR by your side. No matter where you are, you will be connected to the information that interests you.
